about_the_game:
The Shadows of War soundtrack is a collection of 5 music tracks made by Michail Nowak.
Complete duration of the soundtrack is 15:31.

Tracklist:
1 (Main Menu) - Loyal soldiers (03:06)
2 (Ingame 1) - Our home country (03:34)
3 (Ingame 2) - Marching in unity (02:40)
4 (Ingame 3) - Together we stand (03:22)
5 (Ingame 4) - All will end (02:47)

Songs will be placed in your Shadows of War folder in the Steam Directory:
...Steam\steamapps\common\Shadows of War\Soundtrack

The Shadows of War soundtrack will be downloaded to your computer as 320kbps MP3 files.
